page.title: 13POLICING THE CH.BURN AREA
page.content: The Lancashire Constabulary is respon. for the policing,and all the numerous specialist departments of a large force are available to the local officers when they require assistance.Basically 2 rural detached beat officers are respon.for the day to day policing needs,with supporting units from Gisburn,Clitheroe and Barnoldswick. There is very little major crime in the area,the most serious being the very occasional housebreaking.With the River Ribble and the abundance of game in the area,poaching and other allied offences are common.The incidents of juvenile nuisance and minor damage also occupy a considerable amount of police time.Whilst road traffic problems are not paramount,most of the roads are quite often poorly lit and do not have any facilities for pedestrians.
